    def delete(self):
        assert self.notify.debugCall()
        self.off()
        if __debug__:
            assert not self.isActive
            self.count -= 1
            self.debugDisplay()
        del self.cTrav

        del self.shadowNodePath

        del self.cRay
        #del self.cRayNode
        self.cRayNodePath.removeNode()
        del self.cRayNodePath

        del self.lifter
